ingredient_list.text: 4 ripe peaches, halved if possible or cut in large chunks

method.text: Lightly toast the almonds in a pan over medium heat
Turn up the heat a bit and place the butter and half the sugar in the pan. When the sugar begins to melt, add the peaches skin-side down and cook until the bottoms begin to brown (about 5 minutes)
Add the rum, flame it, and the remaining sugar and continue caramelizing for 1 more minute
Turn the peaches over to brown the flesh sides (about 1 minute) and add in most of the almonds
Finely grate over the lemon zest, and remaining almonds as you serve

title: Grilled Peaches with Rum, Almond, Vanilla
